name: The Last Job (Feyriane Does Art)
description:
The Last Job is the story of two thieves with peculiar talents...
One just loves the adrenaline (and treasures), the other is a little more reluctant.

This is their last theft together - before they retire. It depends on you whether they'll spend their retirement years somewhere sunny... or in the city prison!

Puzzle-plateformer - 1 or 2 players (cooperation)

[ Old project ]
[ This is an end-of-year school project I did back in 2016, after a 12 months traineeship at Interface3! ]
